USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

/*procedimiento almacenado que itera procesando cada una de las particiones de archivo de un directorio en el datalake y 
    guarda el resultado particionado en otro directorio - la consulta select de origen se realiza a una vista de la tabla externa de los datos*/

DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_vehicle_registration
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @create_sql_stmt = '
        CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle_registration_' + @year + '_' + @month +'
        WITH (
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src, 
        LOCATION = ''silver/vehicle_registration/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''',  
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT
    
        vehicleId       AS vehicle_id,
        locationId      AS location_id,
        propietaryId    AS propietary_id,
        dolVehicleId    AS dol_vehicle_id,
        registrationDate AS registration_date
    FROM bronze.vw_vehicle_registration_csv
    WHERE year = '''+ @year + ''' AND month = '''+ @month +'''
    ';

    PRINT(@create_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

    SET @drop_sql_stmt = 
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle_registration_' + @year + '_' + @month;
    
    PRINT(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;
END
GO
